QuestData.Title: All Spirits Great and Small
QuestData.Description:
The time has come for us to rekindle another animal spirit.
This one was lost to fire and raiding in a distant land.
Go. Commune with the creature's remains. Release its spirit so that it may return here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Kun-Lai Summit in search of the remains

Objectives.Objective: Commune with the remains in Kun-Lai Summit
